name: Bigo superkong saga
description:
Bigo Super Kong is a cool and amazing platform game !!!

Everything has been carefully designed for you to have a lot of fun!
Bigo Super Kong is a monkey has many skills and magic stick !
Collect as many coin as possible to buy skill item or weapons.Also, Bigo Super Kong can pick up items on scene!
Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.

-------------------------------

To play you simple touch buttons to run, attack, change weapons or jump.
Bigo Super Kong can jump over your enemies to kill them and your goal run to the end. A huge saga map is coming
Download Bigo Super Kong now! It is a fun game for everyone. Try it out and enjoy!

-------------------------------

Features:
- Saga map contains many beauty environments
- Great 2d graphic
- Many levels (more coming soon)
- Retro platformer/side-scroller gameplay
- Shop system contain : skill, item or coin
- 20 enemies for all saga map
- Upgradable characters
- Achievements
- Leaderboards
- Social network

-------------------------------

We hope all our players have a great time playing it,thanks a lot!
